title: [安全]LagMonitor —— 还在为服务器卡顿而找不到原因吗？ 来看看这个！ [1.8-1.9]
author: simon3000
txt_content:
这个插件6啊
直接...我看到那个图表我直接跪了...

replies.author: 黑
replies.txt_content:
标题: [安全]LagMonitor —— 还在为服务器卡顿而找不到原因吗？ 来看看这个！ [1.8-1.9] 本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 20:53 编辑 
Description
Gives you the possibility to monitor your server performance. This plugin is based on the powerful tools VisualVM and Java Mission Control, both provided by Oracle. This plugin gives you the possibility to use the features provided by these tools in Minecraft itself. This might be useful for server owners/administrators who cannot use the tools.
Furthermore it especially made for Minecraft itself. So you can also check your TPS (Ticks per seconds), player ping, server timings and so on.

上面那一长串大概的意思就是这个插件可以监控你的服务器性能和一些数据，牛逼到连你服务器啥系统都能在服务器中写出来。
同时也能检测一些TPS和Timings一系列的数据 一目了然直接在对话框提示给你



Notice
Although the first major version is released, it doesn't mean the plugin is finished. Some commands aren't optimized and as you can see on the Github page a lot of stuff isn't implemented yet (including better command output styling).
It's not easy to develop such plugin and it needs a lot time. If you like the project, leave astar on Githuband contribute there.
虽然这是第一个大版本，但是斌不意味着插件不更新了，很多命令都没有优化，你也能在GitHub上看到很多功能都没有实现，包括更好的排版、开发这个插件很不容易，开发时间也很慢，如果你喜欢这个插件请去GitBub给我投一颗星在贡献那里这个插件的作者很不容易的，Spigot一个同类型的查询插件Massivelag就要200块钱 而这个完全免费，多去支持一下作者给他评论支持一下、


FeaturesPlayer ping玩家延迟查询Sample CPU usage处理器使用情况Analyze RAM usage内存使用情况Manage Java Flight Recordings - See thisJava运行情况Access to Stacktraces of running threads跟踪访问运行线程Shows your ticks per second with historyTicks每秒变化历史图Shows system performance usage系统性能的使用图Visual graphs ingame游戏内的图型化提示Ingame timings viewer游戏内的Timings查询Access to Java environment variables (mbeans)访问Java环境变量Plugin specific profiles插件特定配置文件Thread safety checks线程安全查询Blocking operations on the main thread check主线程检查操作Information about native OS本机系统信息 这个好牛逼Compatible 1.8+ servers1.8+以上全部兼容Test with Spigot, PaperSpigot and TacoSpigot测试运行于、Spigot、PaperSpigot、TacoSpigotOpen Source开源




Source code

下载附件

2016-4-8 15:38 上传





https://github.com/games647/LagMonitor



Commands
/ping - 查看你的延迟/ping <player> - 查看该玩家延迟/stacktrace - 获取当前的线程追踪/stacktrace <threadName> - 指定线程追踪/thread - 输出所有正在运行线程的当前状态/tpshistory - 输出TPS每秒历史/mbean - 列出所有可用的Java环境信息/mbean <beanName> - 指定mbean的所有可用属性/mbean <beanName> <attribute> - 输出此mbean的值数/system - 给你服务器的一般信息 (Minecraft相关)/env - 给你服务器的一般信息 (系统相关)/timing - 获取服务器的Timings列表/monitor - 查看CPU使用情况/graph [heap/cpu/thread/classes] - 给你服务器的数据展示图 (地图)/native - 服务器操作系统信息/vm - 输出虚拟机的信息，如Java垃圾回收，Java启动参数/tasks - 关于服务器的任务运行信息/paper - 输出关于PaperSpigot的Timings列表/heap - 关于服务器内存






Permissions
lagmonitor.* - 所有权限
lagmonitor.commands.* - 指令权限


All command permissions
lagmonitor.command.pinglagmonitor.command.stacktracelagmonitor.command.threadlagmonitor.command.tpsagmonitor.command.mbeanlagmonitor.command.systemlagmonitor.command.environmentlagmonitor.command.timinglagmonitor.command.monitorlagmonitor.command.graphlagmonitor.command.nativelagmonitor.command.vmlagmonitor.command.taskslagmonitor.command.paperlagmonitor.command.heap
